activities: RTI Surgical Inc is a leading global provider of sterile biologic, metal, synthetic and synthetic based implants for surgeries with a commitment to advancing science, safety and innovation.  In connection with its business activities, it collects and processes personal information pertaining to residents of the European Union and Switzerland for purposes of human resources administration, innovation and clinical research, manufacturing and processing orders from customers and suppliers, marketing, regulatory compliance, and related business purposes, corporate transactions, and other legal and business activities.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organizational, Client, and Customer data.  Human resource, clinical research participant, patient, customer, supplier and other business partner personal data in all formats, including electronic and off-line.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
